statements.sql: select `images`.*, `image_product`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `image_product`.`image_id` as `pivot_image_id` from `images` inner join `image_product` on `images`.`id` = `image_product`.`image_id` where `image_product`.`product_id` in ('1')
